Item.Name: X Attack
Item.Effect: Raises the Attack of a Pokémon currently in battle by 1 level.
Item.Description: An item that sharply boosts the Attack stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Item.Name: Dire Hit
Item.Effect: Raises the critical hit ratio of a Pokémon currently in battle by 1 level. Does not stack with itself or Focus Energy.
Item.Description: An item that raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Item.Name: Guard Spec.
Item.Effect: Prevents stat reduction by opponents' moves for the user's party for five turns.
Item.Description: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer's party Pokémon for five turns after it is used in battle.
